verses.verse: Have mercy <S%H2603><s%> on me, <S%H430><s%> God, according to your loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%> According to the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of your tender mercies, <S%H7356><s%> blot out <S%H4229><s%> my transgressions. <S%H6588><s%>
Wash <S%H3526><s%> me thoroughly <S%H7235><s%> from my iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> Cleanse <S%H2891><s%> me from my sin. <S%H2403><s%>
For I know <S%H3045><s%> my transgressions. <S%H6588><s%> My sin <S%H2403><s%> is constantly before me. <S%H8548><s%>

Against you, <S%H2398><s%> and you only, have I sinned, and done <S%H6213><s%> that which is evil <S%H7451><s%> in your sight; <S%H5869><s%> that you may be proved right <S%H2135><s%> when you speak, <S%H1696><s%> and justified <S%H2135><s%> when you judge. <S%H8199><s%>
Behold, <S%H2342><s%> I was brought forth in iniquity. <S%H5771><s%> In sin <S%H2399><s%> my mother <S%H517><s%> conceived me. <S%H3179><s%>
Behold, <S%H2654><s%> you desire truth <S%H571><s%> in the inward parts. <S%H2910><s%> You teach <S%H3045><s%> me wisdom <S%H2451><s%> in the inmost place. <S%H5640><s%>
Purify <S%H2398><s%> me with hyssop, <S%H231><s%> and I will be clean. <S%H2891><s%> Wash <S%H3526><s%> me, <S%H3835><s%> and I will be whiter than snow. <S%H7950><s%>
Let me hear <S%H8085><s%> joy <S%H8342><s%> and gladness, <S%H8342><s%> That the bones <S%H6106><s%> which you have broken <S%H1794><s%> may rejoice. <S%H1523><s%>
Hide <S%H5641><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%> from my sins, <S%H2399><s%> and blot out <S%H4229><s%> all of my iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>
Create <S%H1254><s%> in me a clean <S%H2889><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> O God. <S%H430><s%> Renew <S%H2318><s%> a right <S%H3559><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within me. <S%H7130><s%>
Don't <S%H7993><s%> throw me from your presence, <S%H6440><s%> and don't <S%H3947><s%> take your holy <S%H6944><s%> Spirit from me. <S%H7307><s%>
Restore <S%H7725><s%> to me the joy <S%H8342><s%> of your salvation. <S%H3468><s%> Uphold <S%H5564><s%> me with a willing <S%H5081><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
Then I will teach <S%H3925><s%> transgressors <S%H6586><s%> your ways. <S%H1870><s%> Sinners <S%H2400><s%> shall be converted to you. <S%H7725><s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me from bloodguiltiness, <S%H1818><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation. <S%H8668><s%> My tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall sing aloud <S%H7442><s%> of your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> open <S%H6605><s%> my lips. <S%H8193><s%> My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall declare <S%H5046><s%> your praise. <S%H8416><s%>
For you don't <S%H2654><s%> delight in sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> or else I would give <S%H5414><s%> it. <S%H7521><s%> You have no pleasure in burnt offering. <S%H5930><s%>

The sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> are a broken <S%H7665><s%> spirit. <S%H7307><s%> A broken <S%H7665><s%> and contrite <S%H1794><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> O God, <S%H430><s%> you will not despise. <S%H959><s%>
Do well in your good <S%H3190><s%> pleasure <S%H7522><s%> to Zion. <S%H6726><s%> Build <S%H1129><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Then you will delight <S%H2654><s%> in the sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> in burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and in whole <S%H3632><s%> burnt offerings. <S%H5930><s%> Then they will offer <S%H5927><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> on your altar. <S%H4196><s%>
